text: Tamen zai huo yu li [gao sheng] qiujiu shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang women chuqu ba! Women yiding gai e xingshan.”[An la dafu shuo]:“Nandao wo meiyou yanchang nimen de shouming [zhu 1], rang yuan jieshou quangao zhe jieshou quangao ma [zhu 2]? Erqie jinggao zhe ye daoguo nimen zhong [jinggao nimen]. Nimen changshi [nimen zuo'e de] xingfa ba! Bu yi zhe jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.”
